survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of participants in our professional certification programs. The feedback will help improve course content, delivery methods, and overall participant experience.

questions.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with text field to capture certifications not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button field with 'Other' option triggering a text input field.

script.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button field with horizontal layout for scale options.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of the certification program?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key strengths of the program.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox field with 'Other' option triggering a text input field.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How prepared did you feel for the certification exam after completing this program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure perceived exam preparedness.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button field with vertical layout for clarity.

script.question_text: How prepared did you feel for the certification exam after completing this program?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for this certification program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback for program enhancement.
questions.scripter_notes: Text input field with multi-line capability for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for this certification program?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this certification program to colleagues?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to measure recommendation likelihood.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button field with 5-point scale options.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this certification program to colleagues?
